attachment.script:
const dashRef = admin.database().ref(`dashboards/${data.dashboard}`)
let mentors = (await dashRef.child(`models/cohortData/${context.data.cohort}/mentors`).once('value')).val() || ''
if (!mentors.includes(context.data.mentor)) {
  if (mentors) mentors += `,${context.data.mentor}`
  else mentors += context.data.mentor
}

createLog(
  callDash,
  '',
  mentors,
  'cohortData',
  context.data.cohort,
  'mentors'
)
